festivalData.name: Design Village
festivalData.description: Let's face it: designer is not the only person behind the design. Sometimes you need a little help from data specialists, marketers, AI engineers, artists or from all of them at a time to come up with a final vision. So, how does the whole ‘working together’ process in design really look like and how does the cooperation affect the project? Join us on a three day design festival to have the answers.

description.description1: Mixed media art works exhibition.
Olha Protasova is Kyiv-based freelance illustrator and graphic designer, at the moment happily focused on things she loves best: lettering, illustration community in Ukraine and her family.

Leo Natsume is a talented visual designer with a focus on Digital Design - UI/UX, interaction design and mainly illustration, currently working at Grupo RBS, based in Porto Alegre/Brazil. Clients: Google, Uber, Huawei, Nike, Disney, Coca-Cola, NYT, Mercedes-Benz, WillSmith, others.
"Social poster", workshop of graphic designer, art director dnkstudio Nikolai Kovalenko'
Head of BBDO Branding, BBDO Ukraine. Clients: Staropramen, Stella Artois, Mars, WOG, Pepsi, Kotex, Snickers.
You won't find it in any travel guide: a complete image of modern Ukraine, bright and ironic, portrayed on posters and illustrations.
Selection of the best Polish books from the Polish Graphic Awards.

After Notre-Dame de Paris tragedy famous ukrainian graphic designer Mykola Kovalenko together with the French Institute in Bratislava announced a poster call. We are glad to show you best 24 posters from around the world dedicated to Notre-Dame de Paris.

event.name: Workshop from the Calligraphy and Lettering School "Art and I"

leader.name: Calligraphy and Lettering School "Art and I"

description.description1: NO DESCRIPTION

Crello is one of the favorite tools of anyone who needs to create graphic content for social networks, online advertising or email marketing frequently and quickly. At Design Village the DEPOSITPHOTOS team will talk about how to work with Crello and introduce participants to the most interesting functionality of the platform.

Hi there! So good to see you! We will start with a short greeting just to say hello and let you know what is waiting for you today — lectures, workshops, exhibitions, parties or some schedule changes. All What? Where? and When? in this 20 minutes or less.

Tatiana Boksha - Visual Content Curator в Depositphotos. Tatiana will tell you how to work more effectively with the Depositphotos platform, use unobtrusive but useful features and find the best visual content to work with.

event.name: Artist collaboration with big companies in the design industry

description.description1: Leo Natsume is a Brazilian illustrator and creative designer. Creates illustrations for Huawei, Uber, Google, Vans and Apple. In his lecture, Leo will talk about his approaches to illustration, examine case studies from his own practice, and then answer participants' questions in an open dialogue format.
Moderator - Anze Jereb, Regional Executive Creative Director, BBDO Ukraine & Central Asia.

leader.name: Tatiana Boksha, Leo Natsume, Anze Jereb

description.description1: Design evening at Promprylad. Renovation
Exchange your ticket to a member's bracelet — you can show it from your smartphone or print a copy from your mail. One bracelet for three days of conference — try not to lose it!

Hi there! So good to see you! We will start with a short greeting just to say hello and let you know what is waiting for you today — lectures, workshops, exhibitions, parties or some schedule changes. All What? Where? and When? in this 10 minutes or less.

event.name: How to compete and win in designer competitions?

description.description1: Graphic designer, researcher, and design curator, Jury at European Design Awards. Warsaw, Poland.
VR Manager at Google. Zürich Area, Switzerland.

Take the coffee and go out to breathe fresh air a bit. But better is to do some exercises — walk the stairs up and down or just walk around the Ivan Franko Academic Music-Drama Theater — it's good for the brain! ;-)

event.name: Making a difference by working as a design team

description.description1: Design Director, MediaMonks. Amsterdam, Netherlands.
Illustrator and Art Director, Milan, Italy

Bon appetit! Smachnogo! You have an hour and half to take a break and have some good food. Use a 10% discount at the KUCHNIA restaurant (Sichovyh Striltsiv Str., 41). Just say "I'm from Design Village!" and get your discount.

event.name: Design skills: Soft is the new hard
